channel.title: Pit on Make a Wish Westview
channel.description: Recent content in Pit on Make a Wish Westview

item.title: February 16th at 7PM
item.description: Pack The Pit: Miracle Minute Come Enjoy the Girls Varsity Basketball Game on Feb. 16th at 7PM Join us during half-time for a special ‘Miracle Minute’ and the chance to make a half-court shot! Step up, take your best shot, and you could walk away with an amazing prize. Don’t miss this exciting opportunity to showcase your skills, win big and help out!

item.title: February 23rd at 7PM
item.description: Come Enjoy the Boys Varsity Basketball Game! Wolfe Dental will host a raffle for a free Invisalign treatment worth $5900.00 (must be at least 16 years old). Catch the ‘Miracle Minute’ during half-time, and stay for the half-court shot challenge! Make the half-time shot and win a prize!
